This is to inform all students seeking admission into Alberta University that the online screening is open for the 2024 Academic session.

The University of Alberta Admission Application Deadline for Fall 2024 / Winter 2024 Term

Registration:

This Information is about the implications of missing each deadline is included:

  • If any deadline is missed it can affect your course registration, your grades, and your fee assessment.
  • Please be sure to meet these deadlines because there is no fees appeal for missing a deadline affecting your fee assessment Registration Dates and Deadlines

The future and present students of Alberta University must take note of the following information.

  •  Students who have not to make payments of fees in full by this date, or made satisfactory alternate arrangements, will be assessed late payment penalty charges.
  • To avoid installment of charges, all Fall/Winter fees must be paid by the Fall Term Fee Payment Deadline and Spring/Summer fees must be paid by the Spring Term Fee Payment Deadline. Refer to Deadline for Fee Payment for details.
  • All Students withdrawing after the given date will be assessed full fees.
  • If you withdraw from a two-term (A/B part) course from October 3, 2024, to January 22, 2024, you will be assessed full fees for Fall Term.
  • If your Faculty determines that you may have special permission to withdraw from January 23 to February 10, 2024, you will be assessed Fall

Term fees and 50% of Winter Term fees.

After the given date (February 10, 2024), you will be assessed full fees for both terms.

University of Alberta Application Processing

  • Visit the Alberta university email to get your form
  • Summiting your application form and all required documents,
  • An admissions advisor has to review your documents and process your application which can take 1 – 8 weeks before you can receive more information from us.
  • You will receive an email and your Launchpad status page will be updated when this is complete.
  • If we require any further information or documents, we will contact you directly through your form details.
  • We appreciate your patience while we are working with a high volume of applications. No additional application status details are available only via phone/email.

To avoid installment charges: If you pay all fall and Winter Term fees by the Fall Term Fee Payment Deadline or all spring and Summer Term fees by the Spring deadline, you will avoid a $40 installment charge.
